title: Prescriptive Skill Hybrid Learning Course Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining clinical scenario-based practice with theoretical frameworks

learning_goals: Learners can perform medication prescription decision-making processes based on patient profiles in various clinical situations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically explain procedures for analyzing drug interactions and side effects to consider during prescription.
Learners can reduce decision-making errors in complex prescription scenarios by 50% using Part-Task Practice from the 4C/ID model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
